sentences.sContent: In many countries you have to haggle before you buy anything.
sentences.sContent_eng: In many countries you have to haggle before you buy anything.
sentences.sCn: 在许多国家里买东西之前都得讨价还价。

sentences.sContent: Israel cannot "haggle its way out of" commitments, Erekat added in a statement. A settlement freeze was an Israeli obligation, he said, not a Palestinian precondition.
sentences.sContent_eng: Israel cannot "haggle its way out of" commitments, Erekat added in a statement. A settlement freeze was an Israeli obligation, he said, not a Palestinian precondition.
sentences.sCn: 艾拉卡特在声明中说，以色列不能“讨价还价，逃避承诺”；冻结定居点扩建是以色列的义务，而非巴勒斯坦提出的前提条件。
